title: 6.8, bringing my league to unplayable
body: so basically this morning i woke up and patched league. i later wanted to play with a friend and when i did this, i found that when i clicked the icon t start league, the patcher would close itself. i found a remedy to this and had to install league again, and with Australia`s internet speed it took me around 3-4 hours {{item:3070}} . now i can launch the patcher, the game wont start. i am typing this as i am repairing the launcher hoping it will solve this problem. i just wanted to know if my problem was unique or if others are having the same problem.
